projects.title: Projects
projects.p1_desc: PowerApps + SharePoint app that allows each employee to access only the protocols assigned to their role and department.
projects.p1_why: This project was one of my first experiences with a real-world environment. I had to understand user needs, internal workflows and platform limitations. The most valuable part was learning to integrate different tools into a coherent flow that automates tasks and reduces manual errors. It was my first real step into the idea of a 'complete solution'.
projects.p2_desc: Fictional product catalog with full CRUD: add, update, delete, filter and sort products across multiple screens.
projects.p2_why: This project helped me understand how to structure, manage and manipulate data within a desktop application. It was an exercise that taught me to plan screens, maintain data consistency and apply basic architecture principles.
projects.p3_desc: Kotlin Android app that consumes the Pokémon API to display relevant Pokémon information.
projects.p3_why: Here I learned to work with real APIs and JSON trees. Beyond the playful theme, I learned how client-server communication works and how to present dynamic data efficiently in Android.

xp.title: Experience & Certifications
xp.xp1_title: DAM Internship — Hospital San Juan de Dios (2025)
xp.xp1_body: Hybrid role between technical support and internal development. I managed incidents, configured equipment, documented procedures and improved internal applications. I learned data integration, task automation and how to translate user needs into functional solutions.
xp.xp2_title: Final Project — PowerApps + SharePoint + Access + Excel (2025)
xp.xp2_body: I built a full application connecting PowerApps, SharePoint, Access, Excel and a VBScript automation script. This was my first end-to-end project, covering logic design, data integration, automation and deployment.
xp.xp3_body: A role that strengthened communication, incident management and structured documentation in a CRM. This helps me translate user needs into clear and actionable technical tasks.

services.title: Services
services.s1_body: I build small internal applications, automate repetitive workflows and connect data across tools. Experience with PowerApps, SharePoint, Access, VBScript and REST APIs.
services.s2_body: I create clean, functional websites using WordPress, with modern design and basic maintenance. Also comfortable with HTML and CSS for custom adjustments.
services.s3_body: Incident resolution, diagnostics, documentation and user guidance. Strong ability to detect issues and propose practical, efficient solutions.

about.title: About me
about.body: I’m a junior developer with a bilingual DAM background and experience building internal tools that connect data, automate workflows and make users’ lives easier. I’ve worked with PowerApps, SharePoint, Access, Excel, Kotlin, C#, Python and SQL. I’m looking for a team where I can keep learning while delivering real value from day one.
